synopsis.text: One day, Joey, a kind-hearted orphan living with his grandmother in Center City, stumbles upon a broken toy robot, a Heybo, discarded by some bullies. With a dream of becoming a hero and a love for robots, Joey takes the damaged toy home, fixes it, and names it Heroman. In a twist of fate, a lightning strike transforms Heroman into a colossal, American flag-adorned robot that responds to Joey's commands. As an alien race called the Skrugg sets its sights on Earth, Joey and his powerful new friend stand as humanity's last hope against the impending invasion. With courage, determination, and the help of his friends, Joey embarks on a thrilling adventure to save the world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
